info.author: Mr. Megee presents...
info.title: The Mr. Megee Idle Game!
info.body:
*Oh no you're a spider, and you're stuck in the middle of the woods! You need to build a humanator to return back to your usual self!*

Every message you send earns you XP. Convert that XP to coins to buy things from the shop OR gain enough XP to level up. Each level up lets you earn a perk which do more varied things than the items in the shop. 

Your goal is to gather enough XP to complete your current task. Once you reach the level needed, you can prestige which will reset everything but advance you through the construction process.

fields.name: Want to play?
fields.description: Type `xd)idle play` to create your profile and get started

fields.name: Note!
fields.description: This is an idle game. There's no need to quickly earn XP fast by spamming and annoying everyone. Just earn it naturally and don't think about the game until it's time to think about it!

help.title: The Mr. Megee Idle Game: HELP
help.body:
Every message you send earns you XP. Convert that XP to coins to buy things from the shop OR gain enough XP to level up. Each level up lets you earn a perk which do more varied things than the items in the shop.

Your goal is to gather enough XP to complete your current task. Once you reach the level needed, you can prestige which will reset mostly everything but advance you through the story.

fields.name: Commands
fields.description:
`xd)idle help` Shows a list of commands
`xd)idle convert [num]` convert an amount of XP to Coins
`xd)idle shop` View the shop
`xd)idle buy <num>` Purchase an item from the shop with coins
`xd)idle stats` View your stats, perks, and progress
`xd)idle prestige` Activate your prestige if it's ready (check stats for progress)
`xd)idle perk` View perk menu

prestige.name: Research
prestige.lore: *You immediately get to work on Research and Development.*
status: "Hmm. A little this.. A little that..."
You pour the red potion into the blue potion to make a purple potion.
"Ah. So that's how that works."
The potion explodes in your face.
You're trying to conjure up a grow potion but swiftly realize magic isn't real
R-R-R-RAW SCIENCE!
"I know! I need to change back into a human!"

prestige.name: Planning
prestige.lore: *Research has concluded and now it's time to start planning.*
status: "Hm. Carry the 2, cancel those out. Aha!"
You carve out your plans on the side of a log
Measurements are made based on the size of a leaf.
A predator attacked you while you were planning. You had to hide the entire night.
You use your smarts to make something cooler than a grow potion.
You spend so much time planning that you forgot to eat.
You use all 6 of your legs.
You draw a smiley face on your "blueprints."
"I call it. THE HUMANATOR!"
Local wildlife wonder how you're gonna fit a person in a 5cm capsule.

prestige.name: Gather wood
prestige.lore: *Planning concluded. First you need to gather wood for some tools.*
status: You use the power of your fist to gather wood.
Punching wood hurts, so you just pick up twigs instead.
A local wood-eater eats all your wood!
It's just like a survial videogame! wait.
"Where'd my wood go?"
You create a crafting table with your wood.
Wood would. Would Wood?
A mighty tree, 4000x your height, stands tall before you. Time to get to work.
You meet a fellow carpenter ant. He seemed friendly.
You find a log with several catacombs and an extended story, but you don't have disk 32 to access it.

prestige.name: Create tools
prestige.lore: *Now that you got plenty of wood, you must create tools to help you with construction.*
status: You craft an epic sword!
You craft a killer bow!
You craft a neat fishing pole!
You craft a wicked pickaxe!
You craft a mighty axe!
You craft a sharp pitchfork!
You craft a godly shovel!
You craft a powerful hammer!
You craft masterful shears
You craft a uhh.. just a hoe.
You craft a robust pulley!
You craft a very useful tool that is used for like two things.

prestige.name: Automate the process
prestige.lore: *With your new tools, now you can automate the process. What process? Err I don't know.*
status: You create something straight from a Dr. Suess book.
You get distracted making a factory for five days without stopping.
The process... AUTOMATED.
Automation is key towards increasing production.
You decide to be lazy by having robots do work for you.
You build robots that automatically build robots to automatically build robots.
You feel satisfactory in your factoriork.
You spend eight hours optimizing your production ratios.

prestige.name: Mine for minerals
prestige.lore: *You're going to need some minerals for construction, there's a cave nearby you can use to go deep.*
status: You go mining at night. Big mistake.
You mine some copper.
You mine some iron.
You find an abandoned mineshaft.
You fall into a cramped pit.
You mine some silver.
You mine some tin.
You struck gold!
You get lost in a cave.
Your pickaxe breaks
You find an underground dungeon.
You find a lost girl and decide to help her.

prestige.name: Smelt ingots
prestige.lore: *With your newly aquired ores, you'll need to smelt them into ingots to be able to use them effectively.*
status: The ores are smelting
Every game needs smelting I guess
You accidently spill molten iron on yourself.
You get a low score on Forging and Hammering
Smithing increased to 27
It is very hot.
You work up a sweat.
Is it in-got or in-get?

prestige.name: Construct Shell
prestige.lore: *Now it's time to actually start construction. First you must build the shell of the Humanator.*
status: You use tree sap as glue.
You forgot to flip the canvas and now it's unsymmetrical.
"Wow! This is so boring."
A squirrel destroys your scaffolding.
You are building the shell of the humanator. Just wanted to remind you.
You take a break by flirting with a Wolf spider.
A human child running away from a serial killer knocks over your site.
The tree sap isn't very strong.
An ant complains about all the noise.

prestige.name: Create glass
prestige.lore: *Wait you forgot glass, go create some real quick!*
status: You search everywhere for sand.
There's like no sand anywhere around here.
You need sand to create glass!
All you see is dirt, grass, and other plants.
Your plan is falling apart, there's no sand for glass.
You check your mineshaft... Nope. No sand.
"How can something as simple as this be so difficult?"
Mr. Bug says, "Don't be sad! I'm sure you'll find sand!"
You lose hours of sleep trying to find glass.
You find sand but a spider building the exact same thing takes it before you.

prestige.name: Solder Circuits
prestige.lore: *You actually found sand in a sandbox and you create the glass! Time for the grueling process of soldering!*
status: How are you soldering? Hell if I know.
You connect one wire to another.
You realize this is no different from your spidernator.
Electronics are fun.
A local ant is so confused by what you're doing that he thinks you're god.
You... solder circuits...
You wish you could listen to music while doing this.
You forgot to sleep and you fainted on top your circuits.
An electrostatic discharge occurred and ruined all your progress.

prestige.name: Wiring
prestige.lore: *Now you gotta connect everything together.*
status: You connect the red wire to the junction box.
You cut the blue wire.
Your wires get tangled.
You accidently shock yourself... Somehow
You forgot what that wire did. Oh well, it's there now.
You contemplate connecting the blue and red wires.
You caught a mouse chewing some of your wires.
It begins raining and you were not prepared for the coming flood.
"Hmm. This to uhh this! and you to YOU!"
A bird shits on the humanator. <:MrMegee:548374425771442176>
In a moment of weakness, you connect the red and green wires.

prestige.name: Construct Tube
prestige.lore: *Might as well take a break from electronics by constructing the glass tube the subject will sit in.*
status: You realize a person might not fit in a 5cm tube.
You create the tube, but accidently drop it. It shatters into a million pieces.
This reminds you of when you were first researching.
It's actually really backbreaking for a spider.
Tube.
You're visited by a wandering trader. He sells you a piece of an apple.
You encounter a wild hedgehog. It randomly changes color after eating a few worms and a weed.

prestige.name: Create Input Systems
prestige.lore: *You'll need a way to actually activate your machine, a simple button should do the trick.*
status: You spend five months making a button.

prestige.name: Gather Human
prestige.lore: *You need a subject to transform your body. This won't be pretty.*
status: You contemplate what you're about to do.
You're knife- err needle- is ready.
Just one person. One human. One life.
Your life at the cost of another.
You realize it'll be difficult cramming a body into a 5cm tube.
All the pain and suffering comes down to this.
You see a spider vaccumed by a human. How we are alike.
It has to be done, you say.
It'll all be over soon.

prestige.name: Activation
prestige.lore: *With the \*(ahem)\* subject in place, it's time to actually activate the machine! This is the home stretch!*
status: You feel your molecules re-arranging.
Finally you will be back to your regular self, but at what cost?
BEEZZOOOSSSHOOOOSHOSHOHOOO.
WOOSHOOOWOOSHHH
It's actually really painful.
You feel you are losing some limbs.
You wonder what you'll do after you're human again...
You hope you made the right decision.
Finally, you will return to your true form.
How long did this take???

prestige.name: Finally Human! Thanks for playing!
prestige.lore: *You finally become human! However, the game's not over yet. You are now in the NG+*
status: You are finally human
You look down at what you've accomplished. A tiny machine with human remains in a tube
You try to dance, but something feels off.
How did this happen anyways?
You were small and now you're not.
You feel as though the adventure has only just begun.

prestige.name: Revenge
prestige.lore: *Why did this happen? The cruel events from before your spiderification crawl back into your mind. You feel nothing but anger. Your sanity has been lost. You don't even know how long you spent trying to return to normal.*
status: Your mind is filled with rage.
A vague figure of the one who caused this pain fogs your memory
You are unable to eat.
You cannot sleep.
You've forgotten where you live.
The memories of your past are too great for you to properly function.
These incapabilities may be solved if you find the source of your anger.

prestige.name: The Hunt
prestige.lore: *Now you remember. The project. The doctorate. The greed. It was all him. You don't even know his name.*
status: You remember what he looks like. A student, just like you were.
Walking around, you notice things are different. How long were you gone?
Spiders.
You talk to local residents. Nobody remembers you.
Your home was repossesed.
You recall the days you had fighting off birds trying to eat you. Not much has changed.
You scour through some newspapers. Things are very different in your town.
You describe your situation to someone. They think you're crazy.

prestige.name: Preparations
prestige.lore: *After gathing the clues. You now know who did this to you. He lives in a castle he bought a few miles from here. It's pretty big actually. You're not sure how you missed it. Anyways... You need to make preparations to confront this monster.*
status: You take a sword instead instead of a gun because it's cooler.
You find your glasses and regain your sense of sight. Very critical for what you're about to do.
You punch a punching bag. It uhh doesn't move.
You lift weights while thinking. The camera zooms into your face an-
Wow you're really going to go kill the person who ruined your life.
A police officer asks what you're doing. You manage to outrun him.
You notice that lightning regularly strikes his castle even when it's not raining.

prestige.name: Ready
prestige.lore: *You are now ready to face the great evil. It is a long journey, a full one and a half hours.*
status: Your back really hurts.
You stomp your way through forestry.
You defeat treacherous beasts in your way.
You take a detour to quickly save a princess.
You grind a bit for some XP.
You take a small break to drink water.
Your worries grow the closer you get.

prestige.name: Storming the Castle
prestige.lore: *You finally approach the castle. It has a face on it for some reason. Nether the less, you walk inside.*
status: Most of the ground is floating above lava.
You dodge past rotating columns of fire.
Undead skeletal remains of turtles are attacking you with their bones.
You climb a seemingly endless set of spiral stairs
You move past tons of spooky traps.
It's really hot in here with all the lava and all...
A sense of dread looms on your back

prestige.name: The Battle
prestige.lore: *You make it to the top and see... him. He sees you and immediately pulls out a sword of his own! The duel has begun!*
status: Your swords clash.
You roll constantly around him, but end up just getting hit more.
You block an attack and he stumbles.
You strike, but it does minimal damage.
He has some tricks up his sleeve. You take 20 points of damage.
You try to interegate him mid-fight but he shows no interest in talking.
Your glasses get slightly cracked, limiting your vision a bit.

prestige.name: The Retreat
prestige.lore: *Your sword breaks, so you retreat back outside. You take a few more hours to train.*
status: You are wounded.
You grind even more.
You try to fix your broken glasses.
You use some time travel exploits to get super buff.
You punch a tree and your knuckles start bleeding.
Luckily you remember an easy route to the top of his castle where he resides.
TRAINING MONTAGE DODODODO TRAINING MONTAGE DODODO...

prestige.name: The Return
prestige.lore: *You, now fully trained, return to his castle to find it's like 50x larger.*
status: You spend 50 hours grinding through one room.
There's a pressure plate on the ground
There's like 30 bathrooms in this place.
A lot of the doors are nailed shut.
You casually avoid a dangerous multidimentional vortex
The lava is really annoying.
There's a store randomly here. You buy some potions.

prestige.name: The Climb
prestige.lore: *You finally reach the central stair case. It's a massive spiral staircase that goes miles up.*
status: You walk up the stairs...
You walk up the stairs...
You walk up the stairs...
You walk up the stairs...
You walk up the stairs...
You walk up the stairs...
You accidently trip and fall several steps down.

prestige.name: The Miniboss
prestige.lore: *You finally reach the top, but you are met with a giant spider!*
status: The spider shoots webs everywhere.
You dodge the web shots
You slice one of its legs off.
It evades your strikes by crawling around the ceiling
It tries to bite you.
You try to not sympathize with it.
You question its one tooth.

prestige.name: The Finale
prestige.lore: *You FINALLY reach him... DR. EVIL (pronounced eh-val). You waste no time and begin attacking.*
status: You dodge to the right, you parry to the left.
You attack in rhythmic perfection.
He laughs maniaclly.
He looks very scary
idk you try killing him or something
epic battle music
You question its one tooth.

shop.title: shop
shop.body:
Use your Coins <:Coin:514985713574346758> to buy helpful upgrades to increase XP production!
Do `xd)idle buy <number>` to purchase an item.

fields.name: Description
fields.description:
+1 XP per message
+1 XP per message
+5 XP per message
+5 XP per message
+10 XP per message
+10 XP per message

perk.title: Perks
perk.body:
Spend Perk Points gained from leveling up on Perks!
Do `xd)idle perk buy` to get this perk
OR
`xd)idle perk reroll` to try for a different perk.

The reroll will spend the perk point and immediately give you the new random perk.

reroll.title: Perks
reroll.body: You rerolled and now have this perk!

perklist.name: Payment
perklist.description: Instantly gain a large amount of coins!

perklist.name: Coins Drops
perklist.description: Random chance to gain a coin on a message!

perklist.name: XP Boost
perklist.description: Random chance to gain 7.5x more XP on a message!

perklist.name: Web Mastery
perklist.description: Messages with links give you 50% more XP

perklist.name: Friends of the Wild
perklist.description: Messages with pings give you 50% more XP

perklist.name: Gambling
perklist.description: Each message now grants XP from (xppm - (level*5)) to (xppm + (level*10))

perklist.name: Freebie
perklist.description: Random chance to gain a free coin when converting. (for every coin gained)
